root.name: Zombie Panic in Wonderland
root.description: OverviewZombie Panic in Wonderland is a third person shooter developed for WiiWare. It was well received in Japan becoming number one for WiiWare sales. From a critical standpoint, Japanese magazines such as Famitsu have praised the game also, giving it 'GJ' (Good Job).On March 1st, 2012 Zombie Panic in Wonderland was released on the iPhone and iPad platforms with the title Zombie Panic in Wonderland Plus.PlotA prince who desires everybody to love him develops a new perfume but unknown to him, whoever smells it becomes a Zombie. You can take control of various character such as Little Red Riding Hood and Snow white in an attempt to solve the mystery of how to save the people who turned into zombies.
